description:
Joe-kun, an underground dweller, has come to the surface to rescue Chi-chan, who never returned home after coming above ground. He sneaks into Yuka`s house and begins his rescue mission!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jo, Jo! I`m Gonna Save Chi-chan, Jo!
Jojo! Chii-chan o Sukuu jo Dechi!
じょじょ! ちぃちゃんを救うじょでち!
